thread.title: best stay near Louvre and center Paris
thread.title_full: best stay near Louvre and center Paris - Review of Le Relais du Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 366maxw
title: best stay near Louvre and center Paris
text: Very satisfying stay and very close to the Louvre and center of Paris. Great hospitality, friendliness and correctness. Breakfast in the room is a great idee. I recommend this hotel for couples/singles who like the arts and architecture.
